replies.bodyText: Done. Please check if it's correct or not and let me know.
replies.author: Gaurav-Punjabi

timeline.bodyText:
before inner classes it is not class above, but interface.
Please use "inner type" instead of class/interface, as check name says
timeline.author: strkkk
strkkk

timeline.bodyText: no need for inner inner classes. Keep it simple, just one inner type
timeline.author: strkkk

timeline.bodyText:
violation comment is misplaced.
comments should be on lines where violation is reported.
timeline.author: strkkk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -36,6 +36,48 @@ * 
  * <module name="InnerTypeLast"/>
  *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * class Test { // violation, field should be declared before inner types.

timeline.author: strkkk

timeline.bodyText:
field
it is not a field
timeline.author: strkkk
strkkk

timeline.bodyText: also check will report violation even if there is only one nested type. Please remove other types and leave only one.
timeline.author: strkkk
